meanings.sent1: The resewn shirt looked as good as new.
meanings.sent2: She wore a resewn dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The resewn teddy bear had a mischievous smile.
meanings.sent4: The resewn quilt held memories of warmth and comfort.
meanings.sent5: The resewn curtains brightened up the room.

meanings.sent1: She resewn the button on her coat.
meanings.sent2: He resewn the torn seam on his backpack.
meanings.sent3: The tailor resewn the ripped pants with skill.
meanings.sent4: Her love for sewing made her resewn old clothes with joy.
meanings.sent5: The mother resewn her child's favorite toy to mend it.
